entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow early this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 02 January 2023
